meanings.definition: A person who provides funds for a business venture.
meanings.sent1: The generous grubstakers helped the new company get started.
meanings.sent2: Many successful businesses have relied on grubstakers for financial support.
meanings.sent3: The group of grubstakers at the meeting were like financial superheroes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of startups, grubstakers are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the grubstakers investing in the dream was inspiring.

meanings.definition: To provide funds for a business venture.
